mapper.select: select a.sideDName, b.foodGName, c.cookMName , a.sideDCode, a.sideDImg,a.foodGCode from sideDish a join foodGroup b join cookMethod c where a.foodGCode = b.foodGCode and a.cookMCode = c.cookMCode and a.sideDName like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')

select a.orderDate, b.dietName, b.dietImg from orderlist a join diet b where a.dietCode = b.dietCode and month(a.orderDate) between month(a.orderDate) and (month(a.orderDate)+1) group by a.dietCode limit #{startRecord},#{recordsPerPage}

select count(v.dietNAme) as count from (select a.orderDate, b.dietName, b.dietImg from orderlist a join diet b where a.dietCode = b.dietCode and month(a.orderDate) between month(a.orderDate) and (month(a.orderDate)+1) group by a.dietCode ) v
select count(a.sideDCode) from sideDish a join foodGroup b join cookMethod c where a.foodGCode = b.foodGCode and a.cookMCode = c.cookMCode and a.foodGCode = #{foodGCode}
select * from foodmaterial where foodMName like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
select * from foodmaterial limit #{startRecord},#{recordsPerPage}
select count(*) from foodmaterial
mapper.insert: insert into sidedinfo(sideDCode, foodMCode, foodMAmount) values ((select MAX(sideDCode) from sidedish),#{foodMCode},#{foodMAmount})
insert into sidedish(foodGCode, cookMCode, sideDName, recipe, sideDImg) values (#{foodGCode},#{cookMCode},#{sideDName},#{recipe},#{sideDImg})
mapper.select: select * from foodmaterial where foodMCode = #{foodMCode}
mapper.insert: insert into diet(diseaseCode, dietName, price, dietImg, spDietItem) values (#{diseaseCode},#{dietName},#{price},#{dietImg},#{spDietItem})
mapper.select: select * from disease
mapper.insert: insert into dietinfo(dietCode, sideDCode,sideDType) values ((select MAX(dietCode) from diet),#{sideDCode},#{sideDType})
mapper.select: select f.foodMName, a.sideDName, sum(f.kcal*a.cu) kcal, f.carbohydrate*a.cu carbohydrate, f.protein*a.cu protein, f.fat*cu fat, f.na*cu na from foodmaterial f,(select s.sideDCode, s.sideDImg,s.sideDName,i.foodMAmount/100 as cu,i.foodMCode from sidedish s,sidedinfo i where s.sideDCode=i.sideDCode and s.sideDCode=#{sideDCode}) a where f.foodMCode=a.foodMCode group by a.sideDName;
select s.sideDCode,s.sideDName,s.sideDImg from sidedish s,(select i.sideDcode from diet d, dietInfo i where d.dietCode=#{diseaseCode} and d.dietCode=i.dietCode) b where s.sideDcode = b.sideDCode;
select count(s.sideDCode) from sidedish s,(select i.sideDcode from diet d, dietInfo i where d.dietCode=#{diseaseCode} and d.dietCode=i.dietCode) b where s.sideDcode = b.sideDCode;
select count(a.dietCode) from diet a join disease b where a.diseaseCode = b.diseaseCode and b.diseaseName = #{diseaseName}
select a.orderCode, a.id, b.dietName,a.orderDate ,a.price from orderlist a join diet b where a.dietCode = b.dietCode limit #{startRecord}, #{recordsPerPage}
select count(a.orderCode) from orderlist a join diet b where a.dietCode = b.dietCode

select a.sideDcode,sum(kcal) kcal,sum(carbohydrate) carbohydrate, sum(protein) protein, sum(fat) fat, sum(na) na from (select si.sideDCode,(si.foodMAmount/100)*f.kcal kcal,(si.foodMAmount/100)*f.protein protein,(si.foodMAmount/100)*f.carbohydrate carbohydrate,(si.foodMAmount/100)*f.na na,(si.foodMAmount/100)*f.fat fat from sidedinfo si,foodmaterial f where si.foodMCode = f.foodMCode) a group by a.sidedcode having a.sidedcode = #{sideDCode};
select * from counsel where counselItemCode = 2 or counselItemCode = 5
select a.customer,a.counselCode, a.counselDate, b.address, b.tel, a.counselContent, a.counselItemCode from counsel a join member b where a.customer = b.id and a.customer = #{customer}
mapper.insert: insert into orderlist(id, dietCode, orderDate, price, dietAmount, transportNum, orderItemCode, paymentItemCode) values(#{customer},(select MAX(dietCode) from diet),now(),(select price from diet where dietCode = (select MAX(dietCode) from diet)),1,null,0,1)
mapper.update: update counsel set counselItemCode = 5 where customer = #{customer}
mapper.select: select a.sideDName, a.sideDCode, a.sideDImg, c.dietName, c.dietCode from sidedish a join dietinfo b join (select d.dietCode,d.dietName, d.dietImg, d.price from counsel a join member b join orderlist c join diet d where a.customer = b.id and b.id = c.id and c.dietCode = d.dietCode and a.customer = #{customer} and d.spDietItem = 0) c where a.sideDCode = b.sideDCode and b.dietCode = c.dietCode and c.dietCode = #{dietCode}

select d.dietCode,d.dietName, d.dietImg, d.price from counsel a join member b join orderlist c join diet d where a.customer = b.id and b.id = c.id and c.dietCode = d.dietCode and a.customer = #{customer} and d.spDietItem = 0
mapper.update: update counsel set counselItemCode = 2 where customer = #{customer}
mapper.insert: insert into orderoptions(orderCode, sideDCode) values((select MAX(orderCode) from orderlist), #{sideDCode})
